data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Aporcelaimoides Heyns, 1965 from Vietnam (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Aporcelaimidae), with an updated taxonomy of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alvarez-Ortega, Sergio, Nguyen, Thi Anh Duong, Abolafia, Joaquin, Vu, Thi Thanh Tam, Pena-Santiago, Reyes (2015): Three new species of the genus Aporcelaimoides Heyns, 1965 from Vietnam (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Aporcelaimidae), with an updated taxonomy of the genus. ZooKeys 516: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.10087, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.10087
